short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitter Dials is a Chrome extension that lets you customize your Twitter experience. Control comments, trends and more soonTM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your Twitter experience with Twitter Dials, a Chrome extension that allows you to customize your feed. Easily toggle comments, trends, and other features soon to come. Filter out irrelevant things and focus on the tweets that matter most, saving yourself time and improving your overall experience. Say goodbye to distractions and stay focused. 

Leave a review to request new features and improvements.
